DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : • To compare effectiveness motivational interview versus brief advice conduct randomize control trial General Practice Setting China . OUTLINE : This randomize control study . Patients randomize either intervention arm control arm . • Arm I ( intervention ) : Patients give 20 minute personal talk family physician 's office visit . The family physicians determine stage change smoke cessation ( precontemplative , contemplative , action , maintenance relapse ) use motivational interviewing skill talk . The motivational interviewing skill include express empathy , develop discrepancy , roll resistance , support self efficacy . Up six phone call give patient follow-up , use motivational interviewing skill . • Arm II ( control ) : Patients receive brief advice smoking cessation , last approximately 5 minute . The risk smoke advantage quit explain . The information provide talk standardize . No phone call give follow-up .
